titles.title: Expressing support for the designation of April 10, 2015, as "Venture Smith's Freedom Day".

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform.

bill.summary: 4/13/2015--Introduced. Expresses support for the designation of Venture Smith's Freedom Day to recognize the 250th anniversary of Venture Smith purchasing his freedom and going on to become a successful businessman in Connecticut.
